title: Teilhard de Chardin SJ - Complete Works - Mobi format (Kindle)
description:
(Almost) Complete works of Teilhard de Chardin, SJ. I thinks there's only one book left (Early man in China) to complete this torrent with all his works. Enjoy and seed, please.

All the files are in Mobi format, to be used with the Kindle reader.

These are the files of this torrent:

Appearance_of_Man.mobi
Christianity_and_Evolution.mobi

Letters_to_Leontine_Zanta.mobi
Letters_to_Lucile_Swan.mobi
Letters_to_Two_Friends.mobi
